Texts.Chs: 这台信号发射器已经损坏，虽说它有一个输出节点，但它再也无法发射信号了！
Texts.Eng: A broken signal emitter. Despite having an output node, it never outputs a signal, no matter what!

Texts.Chs: 到底这破玩意儿有什么用？或许我可以使门永远关闭？
Texts.Eng: What's the point of using this broken emitter? Maybe I can use it to keep doors sealed?

Texts.Chs: 叶族人不明白到底这这这破玩意儿有什么用？或许叶族人可以使门永永永远关闭？
Texts.Eng: What'sss the point of usssing thisss broken emitter? Maybe Floran can ussse it to keep doorsss sealed?
